name: Suppressor Grenade
tooltip: Throws a grenade which explodes for <d ref="duckiesHeroRykerGrenade_DamageRadius.amount" style="Blue"/> damage to ground enemies and leaves behid a goop that lasts <d ref="duckiesHeroRykerGrenade_PersistentGoop.periodic.count*duckiesHeroRykerGrenade_PersistentGoop.periodic.durations[0]"/> seconds and slows enemy attack and movement speed by <d ref="duckiesHeroRykerGrenade_BuffSlow.modifiers[0].amount*(-1)" style="Blue"/><Blue>%</>.
